パッケージの使用
org.interledger.cryptoconditions

  • org.interledger.cryptoconditionsを使用しているパッケージ 
    パッケージ 説明
    org.interledger.cryptoconditions
    Contains classes related to Crypto Conditions.
  • org.interledger.cryptoconditionsにより使用されるorg.interledger.cryptoconditionsのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    CompoundCondition
    Compound conditions extend regular conditions by defining the subtypes of all sub-conditions.
    CompoundSha256Condition
    An abstract implementation of CompoundCondition that extends Sha256Condition to provide common functionality for all compound condition classes.
    Condition
    An implementation of a crypto-conditions Condition.
    ConditionBase
    This class provides shared, concrete logic for all conditions.
    CryptoConditionType
    Enumeration of crypto-condition rsa.
    Ed25519Sha256Condition
    Implementation of a crypto-condition using the ED-25519 and SHA-256 functions.
    Fulfillment
    An implementation of a crypto-conditions Fulfillment.
    FulfillmentBase
    This class provides shared, concrete logic for all conditions.
    NamedInformationUri.HashFunction
    From https://www.iana.org/assignments/hash-function-text-names/hash-function-text-names.xhtml
    PrefixSha256Condition
    Implementation of a crypto condition based on a prefix, a sub-condition and the SHA-256 function.
    PreimageSha256Condition
    This type of condition is also called a "hashlock".
    RsaSha256Condition
    Implementation of a condition based on RSA PKI and the SHA-256 function.
    Sha256Condition
    Abstract base class for the *-SHA-256 condition rsa.
    SimpleCondition
    The SimpleCondition is a marker interface to distinguish between simple and compound conditions.
    ThresholdSha256Condition
    Implements a condition based on a number of subconditions and the SHA-256 function.
